clinical_study.brief_title: Neurodevelopment Outcomes After Pediatric Dental Caries Treatment Under General Anaesthesia
clinical_study.official_title: Neurodevelopment Outcomes After Pediatric Dental Caries Treatment Under General Anaesthesia

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to investigate whether early expose to general anaesthesia will influence neurodevelopment.

detailed_description.textblock: Participants, according to the state of illness and clinical requirements, assigned to receive dental caries treatment with or without general anesthesia. During the follow-up, various of neurodevelopment assessment will be done at specific timepoint to investigate whether general anaesthesia will influence neurodevelopment.

primary_outcome.description: according to Wechsler Preschool and Primary Scale of Intelligence fourth edition (WPPSI-IV)

secondary_outcome.description: according to Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function-Preschool Version (BRIEF-P)
according to Adaptive Behavior Assessment System second edition
according to Test of Emotion Comprehension(TEC) (designed by Pons & Harris ,2000)

intervention.description: nitrous oxide, sevoflurane, propofol, cisatracurium, fentanyl for induction and maintenance with sevoflurane

study_pop.textblock: Patients revieve carves treatment in Department of Pediatric Dentistry，School of Stomatology, the Fourth Military Medical University
